scripts.deploy:docs: cd apps/docs && pnpm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy --config wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:landing: cd apps/landing && pnpm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy --config wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:project: cd apps/project && pnpm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy --config wrangler.toml
